ygData.subject: the goblin alchemist
ygData.msgSnippet: First I d like to thank everyone on responding to my post, you ve been a great help all of you. But I ve already spent a while camping him. He s meant to span
ygData.messageBody:
First I'd like to thank everyone on responding to my post, you've
been a great help all of you. But I've already spent a while camping
him. He's meant to span every 72-80 minutes? cause I'd NEVER seen him
and i've spent a couple of lvl's in there from 16-18 and now a while
there and he never seems to spawn! Also when you kill him does he
drop the humerus handled mace every time?
What about the other mobs? Can you provide information for them liek
the where they spawn and the times and lvl's etc? Cause I haven't
spent much time in misty or runneyeye.
Thanks again in advance,

Aedir Swiftstriker
